movies.title: Rampage - Sniper en liberté
movies.plot: A man with a thirst for revenge builds a full body armor from Kevlar and goes on a killing spree.
movies.simplePlot: A man with a thirst for revenge builds a full body armor from Kevlar and goes on a killing spree.

biography.bio: Brendan Fletcher was born on December 15, 1981 in Comox Valley, British Columbia, Canada. He is an actor and writer, known for The Revenant (2015), Freddy vs. Jason (2003) and Rampage - Sniper en liberté (2009).
biography.name: Brendan Fletcher

biography.bio: Shaun Sipos of Croatian descent was born in Victoria, British Columbia, Canada. Sipos debuted before the cameras in 2001 with a small role in "Special Unit 2", and that same year played a series regular on "Maybe It's Me", playing Nick Gibson. Since then, Shaun has developed a successful career in film and television. Also, who starred as Jack, a popular mellow 17-year-old who aspires to be in a band, on the comedy sitcom Complete Savages. Sipos is perhaps best known for playing David Breck on The CW series Melrose Place. Sipos' television credits include a series regular role on the comedy Maybe It's Me, guest starring roles on Smallville, ER, CSI: Miami and Black Sash, and a supporting role on Special Unit 2. His feature film credits include Comeback Season, Skulls 3, Final Destination 2, Baby Geniuses and The Grudge 2. He appeared in the movies Lost Dream, as well as Lost Boys: The Tribe. In 2009, Sipos was cast as David Breck in The CW's Melrose Place, which is an update of the 90's FOX primetime soap of the same name. Sipos signed on to the cast of Life Unexpected to play a teacher who becomes a love interest of the main character, Lux.
biography.name: Shaun Sipos

biography.bio: Michael Kevin Paré was born on October 9, 1958 in Brooklyn, New York City, to Joan (Moroney) and Francis Paré, who owned print shops. His father died of leukemia when Paré was five, leaving his mother to raise their large family of children. Paré was working as a chef in New York City when an agent, Yvette Bikoff, convinced him to try acting. Paré's first starring role was as Tony Villcana on the television series The Greatest American Hero (1981). His well-known film roles were as Eddie Wilson in Eddie and the Cruisers (1983) and its sequel Eddie and the Cruisers II: Eddie Lives! (1989), as well as Streets of Fire (1984) and The Philadelphia Experiment (1984). Other films include Moon 44 (1990), Village of the Damned (1995), Bad Moon (1996), Hope Floats (1998) and The Virgin Suicides (1999). On television, Paré starred with Michael Beck on the CBS police drama Houston Knights (1987), as well as the short lived science fiction series Starhunter (2000).
biography.name: Michael Paré

biography.bio: Born in Washington D.C. and raised in Canada, Frewer attended the same Peterborough, Ontario area high school as his Psi Factor, chroniques du paranormal (1996) co-star Barclay Hope. He trained for the stage in England, spending several years in such varied UK productions as "The Glass Menagerie", "Bent" and "A Comedy of Errors". He has performed in dozens of feature films, TV movies and series. A committed environmentalist, Frewer is a spokesperson for the Rainforest Action Network. When not on location, he and his wife, Amanda Hillwood, and their daughter divide their time between Malibu, California and the Gatineau Hills of Quebec.
biography.name: Matt Frewer

biography.bio: Lynda Boyd has been an actress for over 20 years. She was born in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. She is a versatile performer with an extensive stage, television, film, animation and radio career. She is the mom in the Disney sequel The Wonderful World of Disney: Angels in the Endzone (1997). She was the voice of Viv the bunny on the Fox cartoon series Littlest Pet Shop (1995). She won the role after auditions were held to find an actress with a great singing voice. Lynda has been a singer for many years, having starred in such musicals as "The Rocky Horror Show," "Guys and Dolls," and "Little Shop of Horrors." She has also toured with her band "The Blenders".
biography.name: Lynda Boyd

biography.bio: Robert Clarke was born on May 6, 1970 in Huntsville, Ontario, Canada as Robert Patrick Clarke. He is an actor, known for Spotlight (2015), The 6th Day (2000) and Rampage - Sniper en liberté (2009).
biography.name: Robert Clarke

biography.bio: After graduating from the University of Vermont and attending Columbia University Graduate School in New York, Malcolm Stewart made his Broadway debut in "Dracula" with Frank Langella. Other Broadway shows include "Bedroom Farce" and "Torch Song Trilogy". He is a licensed pilot, a proud father of a Summa Cum Laude graduate in Economics and is a citizen of three countries. Recently, he was honored to be the only actor featured in three films at the prestigious 2009 Sundance Film Festival. "Moon" with Sam Rockwell, "Grace" a psychological thriller and "Helen" with Ashley Judd. He is married to Dr. Thecla Schiphorst.
biography.name: Malcolm Stewart

biography.bio: Steffen Mennekes is an actor and writer, known for Stoic (2009), La couleur de la victoire (2016) and BloodRayne: The Third Reich (2011).
biography.name: Steffen Mennekes

biography.bio: Katey Grace is an actor and writer, known for Rampage - Sniper en liberté (2009), Dawna (2010) and Hastings Street (2007).
biography.name: Katey Grace

biography.bio: Laurie Brunetti is an actor, known for Rampage - Sniper en liberté (2009), Evirati (2000) and 5ive Days to Midnight (2004).
biography.name: Laurie Brunetti

biography.bio: Mark Brandon is an actor and producer, known for Supernatural (2005), A Series of Unfortunate Events (2017) and Zoo (2015). He has been married to Joanne Brandon since 2009.
biography.name: Mark Brandon

biography.bio: Julie Patzwald was born on March 11, 1980 in British Columbia, Canada. She was an actress, known for Shattered (2007), John Tucker Must Die (2006) and Rampage - Sniper en liberté (2009). She died in April 2012 in Vancouver, British Columbia.
biography.name: Julie Patzwald

biography.bio: Katharine Isabelle was born on November 2, 1981 in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada as Katharine Isobel Murray. She is an actress, known for Ginger Snaps (2000), American Mary (2012) and Insomnia (2002).
biography.name: Katharine Isabelle

biography.bio: Colette Perry is known for her work on Rampage - Sniper en liberté (2009), I Spy (2002) and Bones (2001).
biography.name: Colette Perry

biography.bio: Michaela Mann is an actress, known for Capital Punishment (2014), Assault on Wall Street (2013) and Postal (2007).
biography.name: Michaela Mann
